summary: Dr. Garcia and Dr. Wilson significantly underperform on key contract metrics, averaging only 62% compliance vs. practice average of 73%, representing $250,000 in at-risk bonus payments.

financial_impact.math: $250,000/year = 11% compliance gap × 2 providers × $140,000 per provider at-risk bonus

clinical_impact.description: Improving provider-specific contract performance directly impacts patient outcomes.

metrics.description: Potential survival benefit from improved guidelines adherence
Reduced hospitalization with optimal supportive care
Improved quality of life with guideline-concordant care

peer_comparison.description: Top-performing NSCLC providers maintain 85%+ compliance across all value-based contract metrics, significantly outperforming Dr. Garcia and Dr. Wilson.

action_steps.text: Create peer mentoring program pairing Dr. Li with Dr. Wilson
Develop provider-specific dashboard with real-time metrics
Establish financial incentive program tied to contract performance
Analyze practice patterns for Dr. Garcia and Dr. Wilson
Implement biomarker testing protocol for Dr. Wilson's patients
Develop early palliative care intervention for Dr. Garcia
Create NCCN guideline concordance alerts in EHR

suggestions.text: Share best practices from Dr. Li's workflow
Implement monthly case review for non-concordant treatment
